title: Assignment 2: Exploratory Data Analysis
image: images/A2/Purchases by Speculative Buyers Over Time.jpg
description: An exploratory Data Analysis of Boston Area Property Transaction Data

title: Assignment 3: Visualization Design
description: An evolution of visualization design choices from a dataset of U.S. population 1900 to 2000

title: Assignment 4: Pursuasive/Deceptive Visualization
description: A comparison of two visualization choices answering two sides of the same claim using NYPD office complaint data.
